text: Roy Apps (born 1951) is a British screenwriter, dramatist and children's author. He has had 98 books published. In 2001 Apps was awarded a BAFTA for outstanding contributions to children's film and television.BBC News For ten years he wrote for the award-winning CBBC series Byker Grove. == References == Category:British screenwriters Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:British children's writers
title: Roy Apps
